sourcesContent:
import {atom} from "recoil";

export const genreListState = atom({
  key: 'optionListState',
  default: [
    {code: 1, name: "드라마"},
    {code: 2, name: "판타지"},
    {code: 3, name: "서부"},
    {code: 4, name: "공포"},
    {code: 5, name: "로맨스"},
    {code: 6, name: "모험"},
    {code: 7, name: "스릴러"},
    {code: 8, name: "느와르"},
    {code: 9, name: "컬트"},
    {code: 10, name: "다큐멘터리"},
    {code: 11, name: "코미디"},
    {code: 12, name: "가족"},
    {code: 13, name: "미스터리"},
    {code: 14, name: "전쟁"},
    {code: 15, name: "애니메이션"},
    {code: 16, name: "범죄"},
    {code: 17, name: "뮤지컬"},
    {code: 18, name: "SF"},
    {code: 19, name: "액션"},
    {code: 20, name: "무협"},
    {code: 21, name: "에로"},
    {code: 22, name: "서스펜스"},
    {code: 23, name: "서사"},
    {code: 24, name: "블랙코미디"},
    {code: 25, name: "실험"},
    {code: 26, name: "영화카툰"},
    {code: 27, name: "영화음악"},
    {code: 28, name: "영화패러디포스터"},
  ],
});

export const countryListState = atom({
  key: 'countryListState',
  default: [
    {code: "KR", name: "한국"},
    {code: "JP", name: "일본"},
    {code: "US", name: "미국"},
    {code: "HK", name: "홍콩"},
    {code: "GB", name: "영국"},
    {code: "FR", name: "프랑스"},
    {code: "ETC", name: "기타"},
  ],
});
